channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews

item.title: Man fakes cancer diagnosis in attempt to win back ex-wife

item.title: Erika Kirk talks faith and grief: Watch the CBS News town hall

item.title: CBS News Presents: A Town Hall with Erika Kirk
item.description: Erika Kirk opens up about life, loss and political discourse after her husband Charlie's assassination. Watch the town hall, moderated by Bari Weiss.

item.title: WATCH: At 100, war veteran still volunteers to tell history
item.description: Danny New speaks to Arthur Grabiner, a WW II veteran who continues to educate people about his experience during the war in the Pacific.

item.title: Brown University shooting: Police release video of 'person of interest'
item.description: Two people were killed and nine were wounded after a shooter opened fire at Brown University on Saturday, officials said.

item.title: US soldiers, interpreter killed during ambush in Syria: Officials
item.description: Two U.S. soldiers and an interpreter were killed in an ambush by an apparent ISIS gunman in Syria Saturday, officials said.
